issues.message: Rename event handler 'Close_Button_Click' to match the regular expression: '^(([a-z][a-z0-9]*)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?_)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?$'.
Rename event handler 'Create_Button_Click' to match the regular expression: '^(([a-z][a-z0-9]*)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?_)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?$'.
Rename event handler 'GetIMDB_Button_Click' to match the regular expression: '^(([a-z][a-z0-9]*)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?_)?([A-Z]{1,3}[a-z0-9]+)*([A-Z]{2})?$'.
